parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The end time must be later than the start time. The time range cannot exceed one day. We recommend that you specify 1 hour. Specify the time in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: NodeId
parameters.description:
The ID of the node in the instance. You can set this parameter to query the slow query logs of a specified node.

>  This parameter is available only for read/write splitting and cluster instances.

parameters.name: OrderBy
parameters.description:
The dimension by which to sort the results. Default value: execution_time. Valid values:

*   **execution_time**: sorts the results by query start time.
*   **latency**: sorts the results by query latency.

parameters.name: OrderType
parameters.description:
The sorting order of the results to return. Default value: DESC. Valid values:

*   **ASC**: ascending order
*   **DESC**: descending order

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. The value must be an integer that is greater than **0**. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: **30**, **50**, and **100**. Default value: **30**.

parameters.name: QueryKeyword
parameters.description: The keyword based on which slow logs are queried. You can set this parameter to a value of the string type.

parameters.name: SlowLogRecordType
parameters.description:
The type of the slow logs. Default value: db. Valid values:

*   **proxy**: slow logs of proxy nodes
*   **db**: slow logs of data nodes

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm*Z format. The time must be in UTC.
